html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-00762025-02-05ISED
ActTrademarks Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Trademarks Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRADEMARKS REGULATIONS in order to (1) implement a costs awards regime to discourage and prevent undesirable behaviours in proceedings and incentivize parties to efficiently advance proceedings; (2) set out how a party to a proceeding before the Trademarks Opposition Board would be able to request an order that some evidence be kept confidential; (3) clarify how case management may be used in proceedings; and (4) create a simple mechanism for the Registrar of Trademarks to give public notice that the provision related to official marks does not apply with respect to a particular mark in specific circumstances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2025-0019 Publication Date: 2025-02-26
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the TRADEMARKS REGULATIONS in order to (1) implement a costs awards regime to discourage and prevent undesirable behaviours in proceedings and incentivize parties to efficiently advance proceedings; (2) set out how a party to a proceeding before the Trademarks Opposition Board would be able to request an order that some evidence be kept confidential; (3) clarify how case management may be used in proceedings; and (4) create a simple mechanism for the Registrar of Trademarks to give public notice that the provision related to official marks does not apply with respect to a particular mark in specific circumstances.
